name: Basketball (itch) (Kitsch Digital)
description:
It isn't everyday that you get offered the chance to rock out in a VR pod. Then again, this isn't an average day...

You just wanted to play basketball with your friends, but your parents decided to take a trip away for the weekend! That sucks!!! And to make it worse, once you arrived at the hotel, they dumped you in the pool area while they went and got massages! Why do parents do that!?

But as you look around you notice that this place is fancy, and for some reason there are a couple of rad dudes camped out in front of a weird capsule. They tell you it's a VR pod, and if you do enough good deeds you can have a go on it! Do you rise to the challenge?

Basketball: Out Late 2021

Follow Kitsch Digital on itch.io or Twitter for updates!
